history.narrative: Law 19-300, the “Workplace Fraud Amendment Act of 2012,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-169, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 4, 2012, and Dec. 18, 2012, respectively. Returned without the Mayor’s signature on Feb. 11, 2013, it was assigned Act No. 19-668 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-300 became effective on Apr. 27, 2013.
